changelog: üéØ PHASE 2 CORE UX: Recent conversations, enhanced file uploads, auto-scroll, breadcrumbs. Recent Conversations: Added ‚≠ê RECENT section in sidebar (last 5 accessed), pin/unpin functionality, Cmd/Ctrl+1-5 keyboard shortcuts to jump to recent chats. FileUploader Enhanced: Detailed progress (upload speed MB/s, time remaining, uploaded/total size), cancel button during upload, multiple file queue management. Auto-Scroll: Smart detection of user scroll position, 'Scroll to bottom' button with new message count, End key shortcut, smooth animations. Breadcrumbs: Responsive component with route-based navigation (collapses on mobile). ~500 lines added (3 new files: ScrollToBottom.tsx, useAutoScroll.ts, Breadcrumbs.tsx). Build verified 0 errors.

mcp.reason: 66% failure rate, zero unique value vs existing RAG system

archie2.reason: Over-engineered. Simple git-based version works better

coreFeatures.rag: AutoReferenceButler - 626 lines of intelligent context gathering
coreFeatures.semanticSearch: RAG Search System - 602 lines with hybrid vector+keyword search
coreFeatures.embeddings: Embedding Cache - 445 lines with 80-90% hit rate
coreFeatures.knowledgeGraph: Knowledge Graph - 553 lines with entity/relationship tracking
coreFeatures.database: pgvector with HNSW indexes for fast similarity search
coreFeatures.archie: Simple git-based maintenance - 466 lines, hourly cron, auto-commits fixes
